forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny this morning then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
